name: Developing Thinking Skills With the Tink Tonks
overview: Help Tonk find the stolen Toy chest in Gork's castle. Pilot him through the spooky garden and into the castle. Collect the keys to open the doors. Beware Gork, if he sees Tonk he will attack with his evil eye. Was later re-released as "Developing Thinking Skills With the Tink Tonks" by Thundermountain
